trans-unit.source: Initialize the EngineInstance and return a promise that resolves with the instance itself when the boot process is complete.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 EngineInstance ,并在启动过程完成后返回一个与实例本身一起解决的承诺。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the application and return a promise that resolves with the Application object when the boot process is complete.
trans-unit.target: 初始化应用程序，并在启动过程完成后返回与 Application 对象一起解析的Promise 。

trans-unit.source: Initializer receives an object which has the following attributes: name, before, after, initialize. The only required attribute is initialize, all others are optional.
trans-unit.target: Initializer接收一个具有以下属性的对象： name ， before ， after ， initialize 。唯一需要的属性是 initialize ，所有其他属性都是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Initializers
trans-unit.target: Initializers

trans-unit.source: Initializers provide an opportunity to access the internal registry, which organizes the different components of an Ember application. Additionally they provide a chance to access the instantiated application. Beyond being used for libraries, initializers are also a great way to organize dependency injection or setup in your own application.
trans-unit.target: Initializer提供了一个访问内部注册表的机会,它组织了Ember应用程序的不同组件。此外,它们还提供了一个访问实例化应用程序的机会。除了用于库,初始化器也是组织依赖注入或在你自己的应用程序中进行设置的好方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializers provide an opportunity to configure your application as it boots.
trans-unit.target: 初始化器提供了一个在应用程序启动时进行配置的机会。

trans-unit.source: Initializing Instances
trans-unit.target: 初始化实例

trans-unit.source: Initiates the destruction of a destroyable object. It runs all associated destructors, and then destroys all children recursively.
trans-unit.target: 开始销毁一个可销毁对象。它运行所有相关的销毁器,然后递归地销毁所有子对象。

trans-unit.source: Injected properties are lazy loaded; meaning the service will not be instantiated until the property is explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 注入的属性是懒惰加载的;这意味着服务将不会被实例化,直到该属性被显式调用。

trans-unit.source: Injected properties are lazy loaded; meaning the service will not be instantiated until the property is explicitly called. Therefore you need to access services in your component using the get function otherwise you might get an undefined.
trans-unit.target: 注入的属性是延迟加载的；意味着在显式调用该属性之前，不会实例化该服务。因此，您需要使用 get 函数访问组件中的服务，否则可能会得到未定义的信息。

trans-unit.source: Injections can also be made on a specific factory by using its full key:
trans-unit.target: 也可以利用其全键对特定的工厂进行注资。

trans-unit.source: Injections can also be performed on specific factories.
trans-unit.target: 也可以对特定工厂进行注资。

trans-unit.source: Injections can be made into any class that requires instantiation. This includes all of Ember's major framework classes, such as components, helpers, routes, and the router.
trans-unit.target: 可以向任何需要实例化的类进行注入。这包括所有Ember的主要框架类,如组件、帮助者、路由和路由器。

trans-unit.source: Instance initializer receives an object which has the following attributes: name, before, after, initialize. The only required attribute is initialize, all others are optional.
trans-unit.target: 实例初始化程序接收一个具有以下属性的对象： name ， before ， after ， initialize 。唯一需要的属性是 initialize ，所有其他属性都是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Instance initializers receive an application instance as an argument, providing an opportunity to look up an instance of a registered factory.
trans-unit.target: 实例初始化器接收一个应用程序实例作为参数,提供了一个查找注册工厂实例的机会。

trans-unit.source: Instance initializers run after all initializers have run. Because instance initializers run after the app is fully set up. We have access to the store, container, and other items. However, these initializers run after code has loaded and are not allowed to defer readiness.
trans-unit.target: 实例初始化器在所有初始化器运行后运行。因为实例初始化器是在应用程序完全设置好之后运行的。我们可以访问商店、容器和其他项目。但是,这些初始化器是在代码加载后运行的,并且不允许延迟准备。

trans-unit.source: Instances are like Plain Old JavaScript Objects (POJOs) in many ways. You can assign values to them however you like, and generally treat them the same:
trans-unit.target: 实例在很多方面都像普通的JavaScript对象(POJOs)。你可以随心所欲地给它们赋值,而且一般情况下对它们的处理都是一样的。

trans-unit.source: Instantiation
trans-unit.target: Instantiation

trans-unit.source: Instead of 7 failures there should now be 6 (5 acceptance failures and 1 ESLint). You can also run our specific test by selecting the entry called "Acceptance | list rentals" in the drop down input labeled "Module" on the test UI.
trans-unit.target: 现在应该是6个(5个验收失败和1个ESLint),而不是7个失败。你也可以通过在测试用户界面上的 "模块 "下拉输入中选择名为 "验收|清单出租 "的条目来运行我们的特定测试。

trans-unit.source: Instead of allowing the component itself to be responsible for the multiple, let's allow it to be passed in.

trans-unit.source: Instead of copying the whole controller file over to app/controllers/rentals/index.js from app/controllers/rentals.js, we'll just take advantage of JavaScript's import/export feature to re-export the rentals controller as the rentals/index controller:

trans-unit.source: Integration tests serve as a middle ground between acceptance tests, which only interact with the full system through user endpoints, and unit tests, which interact with specific code algorithms on a micro level. Integration tests verify interactions between various parts of the application, such as behavior between UI controls. They are valuable in ensuring data and actions are properly passed between different parts of the system, and provide confidence that parts of the system will work within the application under multiple scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 集成测试是验收测试和单元测试之间的中间地带,前者只通过用户端点与整个系统进行交互,而后者则在微观层面与特定的代码算法进行交互。集成测试可以验证应用程序各部分之间的交互,例如UI控件之间的行为。它们对于确保数据和动作在系统的不同部分之间正确传递是很有价值的,并为系统的各个部分在多种场景下在应用中工作提供了信心。

trans-unit.source: Interestingly, this pattern holds true for many other types of work. Essentially, batching similar work allows for better pipelining, and further optimization.
trans-unit.target: 有趣的是,这种模式也适用于许多其他类型的工作。从本质上讲,将类似的工作批量化,可以更好地进行流水线,并进一步优化。

trans-unit.source: It's not uncommon to use POJOs in Ember code for storing state, representing some models, etc. This works because get and set can be used for any path, on any object, whether or not its an EmberObject, and whether or not the property was declared in advance. trans-unit.source: Let's have a look at a common use case - testing a service - to understand the basic principles of testing in Ember. This will set the foundation for other parts of your Ember application such as controllers, components, helpers and others. Testing a service is as simple as creating a container test, looking up the service on the application's container and running assertions against it.
trans-unit.target: 让我们看看一个常见的用例--测试一个服务--来了解Ember中测试的基本原则。这将为你的Ember应用的其他部分,如控制器、组件、帮助者等奠定基础。测试一个服务很简单,只要创建一个容器测试,在应用程序的容器上查找服务,并对其运行断言。

trans-unit.source: Let's say you are upgrading an app from v3.4 to v3.8. Although you heard there are some new features, your main goal is to keep up with security updates. To do this kind of version upgrade, follow the instructions here in the CLI Guides. That process will make sure that any peer dependencies of the ember.js core codebase get upgraded too. Automated tools will help you make the right changes to package.json and other files. The point of a minor version bump is that you shouldn't need to change anything in your app when you upgrade - it should all keep working, whether or not you choose to adopt new syntaxes and features.
trans-unit.target: 假设您 v3.8 应用程序从 v3.4 升级到v3.8。尽管您听说过其中有一些新功能，但是您的主要目标是跟上安全更新。要进行这种版本升级，请按照CLI指南中的说明进行操作。该过程将确保 ember.js 核心代码库的所有对等依赖项也都得到升级。自动化工具将帮助您对 package.json 和其他文件进行正确的更改。次要版本变更的要点是，升级时您无需更改应用程序中的任何内容-无论您选择采用新的语法和功能，它都应该可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Lets add some protective code to ensure our results do not get out of sync with our filter input. To do this we'll simply provide the filter text to the filter function, so that when the results come back we can compare the original filter value with the current filter value. We will update the results on screen only if the original filter value and the current filter value are the same.
trans-unit.target: 让我们添加一些保护代码,以确保我们的结果不会与我们的过滤器输入不同步。要做到这一点,我们将简单地提供过滤器文本给过滤器函数,这样当结果回来时,我们就可以比较原始的过滤器值和当前的过滤器值。只有当原始过滤值和当前过滤值相同时,我们才会在屏幕上更新结果。

trans-unit.source: Library authors can customize how any object will display in the Inspector. By defining a _debugInfo method, an object can tell the Inspector how it should be rendered. For an example on how to customize an object's properties, see Ember Data's customization.

trans-unit.source: Like HTML, all values for attributes that are not wrapped in strings are coerced to strings. If you want to pass a boolean or number to a component and not have it coerced to a string, wrap it in curly braces:
trans-unit.target: 与HTML一样，所有未包装在字符串中的属性值都被强制转换为字符串。如果要将布尔值或数字传递给组件，并且不想将其强制转换为字符串，则将其用花括号括起来：

trans-unit.source: Like any Ember object, a service is initialized and can have properties and methods of its own. Below, the shopping cart service manages an items array that represents the items currently in the shopping cart.
trans-unit.target: 像任何Ember对象一样,一个服务是初始化的,可以有自己的属性和方法。下面,购物车服务管理一个物品数组,代表当前购物车中的物品。

trans-unit.source: Like any helper, the unbound helper can accept a nested helper expression. This allows for custom helpers to be rendered unbound:
trans-unit.target: 像任何帮助程序一样， unbound 帮助程序可以接受嵌套的帮助程序表达式。这允许自定义帮助程序变得不受约束：

trans-unit.source: Like any service, it can also be injected into helpers, routes, etc.
trans-unit.target: 像任何服务一样,它也可以被注入到帮助者、路线等中。

trans-unit.source: Like functions declared on objects, they can access the instance using this, so they can store and access variables on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 像在对象上声明的函数一样，它们可以使用 this 来访问实例，因此它们可以在实例上存储和访问变量。

trans-unit.source: Like many programming languages, Ember also allows you to write if else and if else if statements in a template.
trans-unit.target: 像许多编程语言一样，Ember还允许您在模板中编写 if else 和 if else if 语句。

trans-unit.source: Like methods, accessors do not exist on the class itself, and instead are on the class prototype. As such, they are only readily accessible on instances of the class. However, they can be added to the class directly using the static keyword, which is described in more detail below.
trans-unit.target: 像方法一样，访问器也不存在于类本身，而是存在于类原型上。因此，它们仅在类的实例上易于访问。但是，可以使用 static 关键字将它们直接添加到类中，下面将对其进行详细说明。

trans-unit.source: Like normal attributes, actions can be a property on the component; the only difference is that the property is set to a function that knows how to trigger behavior.
trans-unit.target: 和普通属性一样,动作也可以是组件上的一个属性,唯一不同的是,该属性被设置为一个知道如何触发行为的函数。

trans-unit.source: Like other helpers, the {{#each}} helper is bound. If a new item is added to or removed from the iterated array, the DOM will be updated without having to write any additional code. That said, Ember requires that you use special methods to update bound arrays. Also be aware that using the key option with an each helper can improve re-render performance when an array is replaced with another containing similar items.
trans-unit.target: 与其他助手一样， {{#each}} 助手也被绑定。如果将新项目添加到迭代数组中或从迭代数组中删除，则DOM将被更新，而无需编写任何其他代码。也就是说，Ember要求您使用特殊的方法来更新绑定数组。还应注意，将 key 一个数组与另一个包含类似项目的数组替换时，将每个助手使用key选项可以提高重新渲染性能。

trans-unit.source: Like the if helper, the unless helper also has a block form.
trans-unit.target: 像 if 助手一样， unless 助手也有一个块形式。

trans-unit.source: Like the filtering methods, the every() and any() methods have analogous isEvery() and isAny() methods.
trans-unit.target: 像过滤方法一样， every() 和 any() 方法具有类似的 isEvery() 和 isAny() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if the user navigates to /posts, the current route will be posts.index, and the posts/index template will be rendered into the {{outlet}} of the posts template.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果用户导航到 /posts ，则当前路线将为 posts.index ，并且 posts/index 模板将呈现到 posts 模板的 {{outlet}} 中。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if you try to call get on a property whose value is undefined, the unknownProperty() method will be called on the object. If this method returns any value other than undefined, it will be returned instead. This allows you to implement "virtual" properties that are not defined upfront.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果你尝试调用 get 关于它的值是一个属性 undefined 的 unknownProperty() 方法将在对象上调用。如果此方法返回的值不是 undefined ，则将返回它。这使您可以实现未预先定义的“虚拟”属性。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, properties that are not decorated with @tracked that you get using get will also autotrack, and update later on when you use set to update them:
trans-unit.target: 同样，使用 get 获得的未使用 @tracked 装饰的属性也将自动跟踪，并在以后使用 set 对其进行更新时进行更新：

trans-unit.source: Make sure you are testing performance on real devices. Simulated mobile environments on a desktop computer give an optimistic-at-best representation of what your real world performance will be like. The more operating systems and hardware configurations you test, the more confident you can be.
trans-unit.target: 确保你是在真实设备上测试性能。在台式电脑上的模拟移动环境可以最乐观地反映出你的真实世界的性能。你测试的操作系统和硬件配置越多,你就越有信心。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you list these dependencies so Ember knows when to update bindings that connect to a computed property. Changing a dependency will not immediately trigger an update of the computed property, but will instead clear the cache so that it is updated when the next get is called on the property.
trans-unit.target: 确保列出这些依赖项，以便Ember知道何时更新连接到计算属性的绑定。更改依赖关系不会立即触发计算属性的更新，而是会清除缓存，以便在对该属性调用下一个 get 时更新缓存。

trans-unit.source: Mirage works by overriding the JavaScript code that makes network requests and instead returns the JSON you specify. We should note that this means you will not see any network requests in your development tools but will instead see the JSON logged in your console. Our update to mirage/config.js configures Mirage so that whenever Ember Data makes a GET request to /api/rentals, Mirage will return this JavaScript object as JSON and no network request is actually made. We also specified a namespace of /api in our mirage configuration. Without this change, navigation to /rentals in our application would conflict with Mirage.
trans-unit.target: Mirage通过覆盖发出网络请求的JavaScript代码来工作，而是返回您指定的JSON。我们应该注意，这意味着您将不会在开发工具中看到任何网络请求，而是会看到控制台中记录的JSON。我们对Mirage mirage/config.js 更新配置了Mirage，以便每当Ember Data向 /api/rentals 发出GET请求时，Mirage都会将此JavaScript对象作为JSON返回，并且实际上没有网络请求。我们还指定了一个 namespace 的 /api 在我们的海市蜃楼配置。如果不进行此更改，则在我们的应用程序中导航到 /rentals 将与Mirage冲突。

trans-unit.source: Models

trans-unit.source: Models are objects that represent the underlying data that your application presents to the user. Different apps will have very different models, depending on what problems they're trying to solve.
trans-unit.target: 模型是表示您的应用程序向用户展示的基础数据的对象。不同的应用程序会有非常不同的模型,这取决于他们试图解决什么问题。

trans-unit.source: Models define the type of data that will be provided by your server. For example, a Person model might have a firstName attribute that is a string, and a birthday attribute that is a date:
trans-unit.target: 模型定义了服务器将提供的数据类型。例如，一个 Person 模型可能具有一个 firstName 属性（一个字符串）和一个 birthday 属性（一个日期）：

trans-unit.source: Models define the type of data that will be provided by your server. For example, a Person model might have a name attribute that is a string, and a birthday attribute that is a date:
trans-unit.target: 模型定义服务器将提供的数据类型。例如，一个 Person 模型可能具有一个 name 属性（它是一个字符串）和一个 birthday 属性（它是一个日期）：

trans-unit.source: Models don't have any data themselves, they define the attributes, relationships and behavior of specific instances, which are called records.
trans-unit.target: 模型本身没有任何数据，它们定义了特定实例的属性，关系和行为，称为记录。

trans-unit.source: Models represent persistent state.
trans-unit.target: 模型表示持久状态。

trans-unit.source: Models tend to be persistent. That means the user does not expect model data to be lost when they close their browser window. To make sure no data is lost, if the user makes changes to a model, you need to store the model data somewhere that it will not be lost.
trans-unit.target: 模型往往是持久的。这意味着用户不希望在关闭浏览器窗口时丢失模型数据。为确保没有数据丢失，如果用户对模型进行了更改，则需要将模型数据存储在不会丢失的位置。

trans-unit.source: Models, records, adapters and the store are the core concepts you should understand to get the most out of Ember Data. The following sections go into more depth about each of these concepts, and how to use them together.
trans-unit.target: 模型、记录、适配器和存储是您应该理解的核心概念,以获得Ember Data的大部分功能。下面的章节将更深入地介绍这些概念,以及如何将它们结合起来使用。

trans-unit.source: Most computed properties should be fairly straightforward to convert to tracked properties. It's important to note that in these new components, arguments are automatically tracked, but in classic components they are not. This is because arguments are put on the args hash, which is tracked property. Since they are assigned to arbitrary properties on classic components, they can't be instrumented ahead of time, so you must decorate them manually.
trans-unit.target: 大多数计算出的属性应相当简单，可以转换为跟踪的属性。重要的是要注意，在这些新组件中，会自动跟踪参数，而在经典组件中则不会。这是因为将参数放在 args 哈希中，该哈希是tracked属性。由于已将它们分配给经典组件上的任意属性，因此无法提前对其进行检测，因此您必须手动对其进行装饰。

For example, you can modify the index route's path by specifying this.route('index', { path: '/custom-path'}).

trans-unit.source: Next we use this.subject() to get an instance of the PostsController and write a test to check the action. this.subject() is a helper method from the ember-qunit library that returns a singleton instance of the module set up using moduleFor.

trans-unit.source: Next we use the owner API to gain access to the controller we'd like to test. Using the this.owner.lookup method we get the instance of the PostsController and can check the action in our test. The this.owner.lookup helper returns objects generated by the framework in your applications and is also exposed in tests for your usage. Here it will return a singleton instance of the PostsController.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用所有者API来访问我们要测试的控制器。使用 this.owner.lookup 方法，我们得到的实例 PostsController 并且可以检查我们的测试动作。该 this.owner.lookup 助手返回一个对象由框架在你的应用程序生成的，也暴露了你的使用测试。在这里，它将返回 PostsController 的单例实例。

trans-unit.source: No documented items
trans-unit.target: 无记录项目

trans-unit.source: No matter how the URL gets set, the first thing that happens is that the Ember router maps the URL to a route handler.
trans-unit.target: 无论URL如何设置,首先发生的是Ember路由器将URL映射到路由处理程序。

trans-unit.source: No single-page application framework provides the appropriate route-level focus for assistive technology in a default manner. This is primarily due to the way pushState works, and the lack of an event hook for JavaScript frameworks to tell assistive technology that the page content has changed. This also means that the focus is unchanged on route navigation, which in some cases means that it would be lost entirely (if the element that previously had focus is now gone).
trans-unit.target: 没有任何单页应用程序框架以默认方式为辅助技术提供适当的路由级别焦点。这主要是由于 pushState 的工作方式，以及缺少JavaScript框架的事件挂钩来告知辅助技术页面内容已更改。这也意味着焦点不会在路线导航上保持不变，这在某些情况下意味着它将完全丢失（如果以前具有焦点的元素现在消失了）。

trans-unit.source: Node.js and npm
trans-unit.target: Node.js和npm

trans-unit.source: NoneLocation
trans-unit.target: NoneLocation

trans-unit.source: NoneLocation does not interact with the browser. It is useful for testing, or when you need to manage state with your Router, but temporarily don't want it to muck with the URL (for example when you embed your application in a larger page).
trans-unit.target: NoneLocation不与浏览器交互。它对测试很有用,或者当你需要对你的Router进行状态管理,但又暂时不想让它对URL进行干扰时(例如当你把你的应用程序嵌入到一个较大的页面中时)。

trans-unit.source: Normal arguments are useful for passing data to be transformed into helper functions. However, because the order in which you pass arguments matters, it is usually best not to have helpers take more than one or two of them.
trans-unit.target: 普通参数对于传递要转化为帮助函数的数据很有用,但由于传递参数的顺序很重要,通常最好不要让帮助函数接受其中的一个或两个参数。然而,由于传递参数的顺序很重要,通常最好不要让帮助函数使用超过一个或两个参数。

trans-unit.source: Normalize the record and recursively normalize/extract all the embedded records while pushing them into the store as they are encountered
trans-unit.target: 归一化记录,并递归归一化/提取所有嵌入的记录,同时在遇到记录时将其推送到存储中。

trans-unit.source: Normalizes a part of the JSON payload returned by the server. You should override this method, munge the hash and call super if you have generic normalization to do.
trans-unit.target: 归一化服务器返回的JSON有效载荷的一部分。你应该重写这个方法,对哈希进行归一化,如果你要做通用的归一化,则调用super。

trans-unit.source: Normalizing adapter responses
trans-unit.target: 适配器响应的标准化

trans-unit.source: Normally this method takes only three parameters. However if you pass an instance of Descriptor as the third param then you can pass an optional value as the fourth parameter. This is often more efficient than creating new descriptor hashes for each property.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此方法仅采用三个参数。但是，如果将 Descriptor 的实例作为第三个参数传递，则可以将可选值作为第四个参数传递。这通常比为每个属性创建新的描述符哈希更有效。

trans-unit.source: Normally you should not need to invoke this method yourself. However if you are implementing raw event handlers when interfacing with other libraries or plugins, you should probably wrap all of your code inside this call.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,你应该不需要自己调用这个方法,但如果你在与其他库或插件接口时实现了原始事件处理程序,你可能应该将所有的代码封装在这个调用中。然而,如果你在与其他库或插件接口时实现了原始事件处理程序,你可能应该将所有的代码封装在这个调用中。

trans-unit.source: Normally, Ember's component model is "write-only". The component takes a bunch of attributes that it got passed in, and uses them to render its template.
trans-unit.target: 通常,Ember的组件模型是 "只写 "的。组件会把它传入的一堆属性,用它们来渲染它的模板。

trans-unit.source: Normally, applications will use the RESTSerializer by implementing the normalize method.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序将通过实现 normalize 方法使用 RESTSerializer 。

trans-unit.source: Not all APIs follow the conventions that the JSONAPISerializer uses with a data namespace and sideloaded relationship records. Some legacy APIs may return a simple JSON payload that is just the requested resource or an array of serialized records. The JSONSerializer is a serializer that ships with Ember Data that can be used alongside the RESTAdapter to serialize these simpler APIs.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有API都遵循 JSONAPISerializer 与数据名称空间和侧载关系记录一起使用的约定。一些旧版API可能会返回简单的JSON负载，该负载只是请求的资源或序列化记录的数组。该 JSONSerializer 是串行器附带的灰烬数据可以沿着被用来 RESTAdapter 序列化这些简单的API。

trans-unit.source: Not all combinations of the supported options are valid. See the documentation on Application#visit for the supported configurations.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有受支持选项的组合都有效。有关受支持的配置，请参阅 Application#visit 上的文档。

trans-unit.source: Not all combinations of the supported options are valid. See the documentation on Ember.Application#visit for the supported configurations.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有受支持选项的组合都有效。有关受支持的配置，请参见 Ember.Application#visit 上的文档。

trans-unit.source: Not all options need to be passed to render. Default values will be used based on the name of the route specified in the router or the Route's controllerName and templateName properties.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有选项都需要传递才能进行 render 。将基于路由器中指定的路由名称或路由的 controllerName 和 templateName 属性使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: Not only did we clean up the original template to be more readable, we now have a <UserProfile> component that we can reuse whenever we need to render information about a given user.
trans-unit.target: 我们不仅清理了原始模板以提高可读性，而且现在有了一个 <UserProfile> 组件，可以在需要呈现有关给定用户的信息时重新使用它。

trans-unit.source: Not to be confused with Shadow DOM. The concept of a virtual DOM means abstracting your code (or in our case, Ember) away from using the browser's DOM in favor of a "virtual" DOM that can easily be accessed for read/writes or even serialized.
trans-unit.target: 不要和影子DOM混淆。虚拟DOM的概念意味着将你的代码(或者在我们的例子中,Ember)从使用浏览器的DOM中抽象出来,转而使用一个 "虚拟 "的DOM,这个DOM可以很容易地进行读写甚至序列化访问。

trans-unit.source: Not to be confused with Virtual DOM. Shadow DOM is still a work in progress, but basically a proposed way to have an "isolated" DOM encapsulated within your app's DOM.
trans-unit.target: 不要和虚拟DOM混淆。影子DOM仍然是一个进展中的工作,但基本上是一种建议的方式,以拥有一个 "隔离 "的DOM封装在你的应用程序的DOM中。

trans-unit.source: Note that deleteCurrentUser is no longer in quotes here as opposed to previously. Quotes are used to initially pass the action down the component tree, but at every subsequent level you are instead passing the actual function reference (without quotes) in the action helper.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，与以前相比， deleteCurrentUser 在这里不再用引号引起来。引号用于最初将操作传递到组件树，但是在每个后​​续级别，您都将在操作帮助器中传递实际的函数引用（不带引号）。

trans-unit.source: Note that deleteCurrentUser is now prepended with @ as opposed to this.previously.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， deleteCurrentUser 现在以 @ 开头，与 this. 相反。以前。

trans-unit.source: Note that frozenCopy() will only work if you also implement Ember.Freezable.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，只有在您还实现 Ember.Freezable 时， frozenCopy() 才起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note that species and createPerson are not valid on the tom and yehuda variables. They are only valid on Person.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是 species 和 createPerson 是不是在有效 tom 和 yehuda 的变量。它们仅对 Person 有效。

trans-unit.source: Note that Ember Data also has a feature called a Model, but it's a separate concept from a route's model hook.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Ember Data还具有称为 Model 的功能，但这是与路线的 model 钩子分开的概念。

trans-unit.source: Note that Ember's default JSON API adapter does not provide the functionality needed to support queryRecord() directly as it relies on REST request definitions that return result data in the form of an array.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Ember的默认JSON API适配器不提供直接支持 queryRecord() 所需的功能，因为它依赖于以数组形式返回结果数据的REST请求定义。

trans-unit.source: Note that Ember's default JSON:API adapter does not provide the functionality needed to support queryRecord() directly as it relies on REST request definitions that return result data in the form of an array.

trans-unit.target: 请注意，JSON-API还允许将对象级错误放置在带有指针 data 的对象中，这表明无法将问题追溯到特定属性：

trans-unit.source: Note that Mixins are created with Ember.Mixin.create, not Ember.Mixin.extend.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， Ember.Mixin.create 是使用Ember.Mixin.create创建的，而不是 Ember.Mixin.extend 创建的。

trans-unit.source: Note that Mixins are created with Mixin.create, not Mixin.extend.

trans-unit.source: Note that actions may be attached to any element of the DOM, but not all respond to the click event. For example, if an action is attached to an a link without an href attribute, or to a div, some browsers won't execute the associated function. If it's really needed to define actions over such elements, a CSS workaround exists to make them clickable, cursor: pointer. For example:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，动作可以附加到DOM的任何元素，但并非所有动作都响应 click 事件。例如，如果将动作附加到没有 href 属性 a 链接或 div 上，则某些浏览器将不会执行关联的功能。如果确实需要在此类元素上定义操作，则存在CSS解决方法以使它们可单击， cursor: pointer 。例如：

trans-unit.source: Note that although you can pass optional arguments these will not be considered when looking for duplicates. New arguments will replace previous calls.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,虽然您可以传递可选的参数,但在寻找重复的参数时,这些参数将不被考虑。新的参数将取代之前的调用。

trans-unit.source: Note that an Array can change even if it does not implement this mixin. For example, one might implement a SparseArray that cannot be directly modified, but if its underlying enumerable changes, it will change also.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,即使一个Array没有实现这个混合器,它也可以改变。例如,我们可以实现一个不能直接修改的 SparseArray,但如果它的底层枚举数发生变化,它也会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Note that an Enumerable can change even if it does not implement this mixin. For example, a MappedEnumerable cannot be directly modified but if its underlying enumerable changes, it will change also.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,一个 Enumerable 即使没有实现这个 mixin 也可以改变。例如,一个MappedEnumerable不能被直接修改,但如果它的底层枚举单元发生变化,它也会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Note that an optional parameter can be sent to a record's send() method, which will be passed as the second parameter to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以将可选参数发送到记录的 send() 方法，该方法将作为第二个参数传递给事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Note that at this point of the tutorial, the data is still provided by the app/routes/rentals.js file. We will make use of the mirage data we set up here in the upcoming section called Using Ember Data.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在本教程的这一点上，数据仍然由 app/routes/rentals.js 文件提供。我们将在接下来的“ 使用余料数据”部分中利用我们在此处设置的海市rage楼数据。

trans-unit.source: Note that because arguments are prefixed with @ in templates, and placed on args in the component definition, we can use the same name for our icon and tooltipClass getters, which is pretty convenient. We can also tell clearly when we look at the template for the tooltip that this.tooltipClass and this.icon are values that come from the class definition, and that means they probably have been used in some kind of dynamic code (in this case, our defaulting logic).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于参数在模板中以 @ 开头，并放置在组件定义中的 args 上，因此我们可以为 icon 和 tooltipClass 吸气剂使用相同的名称，这非常方便。当我们查看工具提示的模板时，我们还可以清楚地知道 this.tooltipClass 和 this.icon 是来自类定义的值，这意味着它们可能已用于某种动态代码中（在这种情况下，我们的默认逻辑）。

trans-unit.source: Note that because it's just a filter, the result will contain any locally created records of the type, however, it will not make a request to the backend to retrieve additional records. If you would like to request all the records from the backend please use store.findAll.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于它只是一个过滤器，结果将包含任何本地创建的类型的记录，但是，它不会向后端发出检索其他记录的请求。如果您想从后端请求所有记录，请使用store.findAll。

trans-unit.source: Note that because it's just a filter, the result will contain any locally created records of the type, however, it will not make a request to the backend to retrieve additional records. If you would like to request all the records from the backend please use store.findAll.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于它只是一个过滤器，结果将包含任何本地创建的该类型的记录，但是，它不会向后端发出检索其他记录的请求。如果您想从后端请求所有记录，请使用store.findAll。

trans-unit.source: Note that bindings don't update immediately. Ember waits until all of your application code has finished running before synchronizing changes, so you can change a bound property as many times as you'd like without worrying about the overhead of syncing bindings when values are transient.
trans-unit.target: 注意绑定不会立即更新。Ember会等到你所有的应用程序代码运行完毕后才会同步更改,所以你可以随意更改一个绑定属性,而不用担心在值是瞬时的情况下同步绑定的开销。

trans-unit.source: Note that component names are capitalized here in order to distinguish them from regular HTML elements, but they are dasherized in the file system.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这里的组件名称是大写的,以区别于常规的HTML元素,但它们在文件系统中是被破折号化的。

trans-unit.source: Note that destruction is scheduled for the end of the run loop and does not happen immediately. It will set an isDestroying flag immediately.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,销毁是计划在运行循环结束时进行的,不会立即发生。它将立即设置一个isDestroying标志。

trans-unit.source: Note that embedded records will serialize with the serializer for their model instead of the serializer in which they are defined.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,嵌入式记录将使用其模型的序列化器而不是定义它们的序列化器进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: Note that for curly components ({{my-component}}) the bindings are already mutable, making the mut unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于卷曲组件（ {{my-component}} 来说，绑定已经是可变的，因此不需要 mut 。

trans-unit.source: Note that for performance reasons, while calling create() you cannot redefine an instance's computed properties and should not redefine existing or define new methods. You should only set simple properties when calling create(). If you need to define or redefine methods or computed properties, create a new subclass and instantiate that.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，出于性能原因，在调用 create() 时,您不能重新定义实例的计算属性，并且不应重新定义现有实例或定义新方法。您仅应在调用 create() 时设置简单属性。如果需要定义或重新定义方法或计算的属性，请创建一个新的子类并将其实例化。

trans-unit.source: Note that the object root can be pluralized for both a single-object response and an array response: the REST adapter is not strict on this. trans-unit.source: Note that there are often alternatives to using next. trans-unit.source: Note: A route with a dynamic segment will always have its model hook called when it is entered via the URL. If the route is entered through a transition (e.g. when using the link-to Handlebars helper), and a model context is provided (second argument to link-to), then the hook is not executed. If an identifier (such as an id or slug) is provided instead then the model hook will be executed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：具有动态路段的路线在通过URL输入时始终会调用其 model 挂钩。如果通过转换输入了路由（例如，当使用链接至 Handlebars帮助器时），并且提供了模型上下文（ link-to 的第二个参数），则不会执行该挂钩。如果提供了标识符（例如id或slug），则将执行模型挂钩。

trans-unit.source: Note: Object Oriented Programming is a fundamental part of JavaScript, but it's not the only part - JavaScript is a multi-paradigm language, and supports Object Oriented Programming patterns along with Functional Programming, Event Driven programming, and imperative programming. You may see strong adherents to different styles both inside and outside of the Ember ecosystem, and that's OK! JavaScript is flexible, and allows you to choose the patterns that work well for you, so don't feel like all of your code needs to be written in a class, and likewise, don't feel like everything needs to be a function.
trans-unit.target: 注意:面向对象编程是JavaScript的一个基本部分,但它不是唯一的部分--JavaScript是一种多范式语言,支持面向对象编程模式,同时支持函数式编程、事件驱动编程和命令式编程。你可能会在Ember生态系统内外看到不同风格的强烈拥护者,这没关系! JavaScript是灵活的,允许你选择适合自己的模式,所以不要觉得你所有的代码都需要用类来写,同样,也不要觉得所有的东西都需要用函数。

trans-unit.source: Note: if you don't know what a "prototype" is, don't worry - it's how JavaScript does inheritance. Most of the details of prototypes are made simpler by native class syntax, and while it's useful to know, you don't need to dig into them to continue learning Ember or to be productive. If you are curious about them, you can check out the MDN docs for more details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您不知道什么是“原型”，请不用担心-这就是JavaScript继承的方式。原型的大多数细节都通过本机类语法简化了，并且虽然很有用，但您无需深入研究它们即可继续学习Ember或提高工作效率。如果您对它们感到好奇，可以查看MDN文档以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: the Promise returned by store.findAll resolves to the same RecordArray instance returned by store.peekAll for that type, and will include all records in the store for the given type, including any previously existing records not returned by the reload request.
trans-unit.target: 注：无极返回由 store.findAll 解析为返回同一RecordArray实例 store.peekAll 该类型，并包括在店里给定类型，包括不被重载请求返回的任何先前存在的记录的所有记录。

trans-unit.source: Notice how aspectRatio doesn't require any annotation at all - it's a plain old native getter, and it'll still work and invalidate if it's used anywhere in a template, directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， aspectRatio 根本不需要任何注释-这是一个普通的本机getter，如果直接或间接在模板中的任何位置使用它，它仍然可以工作并失效。

trans-unit.source: Notice that user.loading, user-loading, loading, and application-loading are not included here, Since about is the common parent for index and slow-model. This means we'll need to handle loading at every level within the route hierarchy where loading feedback is important.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， user.loading ， user-loading ， loading 和 application-loading 在这里没有包括在内，因为 about 是共同的父 index 和 slow-model 。这意味着我们将需要处理路由层次结构中每个层次的加载，其中加载反馈很重要。

trans-unit.source: Notice that below we "wrap" our rentals markup inside the open and closing mentions of list-filter on lines 12 and 20. This is an example of the block form of a component, which allows a Handlebars template to be rendered inside the component's template wherever the {{yield}} expression appears.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，下面我们在第12行和第20行的 list-filter 开头和结尾处“包装”了我们的租金标记。这是组件的块形式的示例，它允许将Handlebars模板呈现在组件的模板中的任何地方 {{yield}} 表达出现。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the positionalParams property is added to the class as a static variable via reopenClass. Positional params are always declared on the component class and cannot be changed while an application runs.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， positionalParams 属性通过 reopenClass 作为静态变量添加到类中。位置参数始终在组件类上声明，并且在应用程序运行时无法更改。

trans-unit.source: Notice that we used triple curly brackets around {{{message.content}}}. This is how Ember knows to insert the content directly as HTML, rather than directly as a string.
trans-unit.target: 注意，我们在 {{{message.content}}} 周围使用了三花括号。这就是Ember知道如何将内容直接作为HTML而不是直接作为字符串插入的方式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that you don't need to pass in the get function to the decorator itself. Instead, the decorator gets applied to the getter function, modifying it in place. Existing computed properties and computed property macros, including custom ones you've defined, can be used with this new syntax:
trans-unit.target: 注意，您不需要将 get 函数传递给装饰器本身。相反，装饰器将应用于getter函数，并对其进行修改。现有的计算属性和计算属性宏（包括您已定义的自定义宏）可以与以下新语法一起使用：

trans-unit.source: Notice the then function called on the result of calling the filter function. The code expects the filter function to return a promise. A promise is a JavaScript object that represents the result of an asynchronous function. A promise may or may not be executed at the time you receive it. To account for this, it provides functions, like then that let you give it code it will run when it eventually does receive a result.
trans-unit.target: 注意在调用 filter 函数的结果上调用了 then 函数。该代码期望 filter 函数返回一个Promise。甲诺是JavaScript对象，它表示一个异步函数的结果。收到承诺时，承诺可能会也可能不会执行。为了解决这个问题，它提供了一些功能，就像 then ，您可以给它提供代码，使其最终收到结果时将运行。

trans-unit.source: Notify the observer system that a property has just changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知观察者系统,某个属性刚刚发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: Now a malicious user simply needs to set their firstName to a string containing HTML (like a <script> tag that sends private customer data to their server, for example) and every user in that chat room has been compromised.
trans-unit.target: 现在，恶意用户只需将其 firstName 设置为包含HTML的字符串（例如，将私人客户数据发送到其服务器的 <script> 标记），该聊天室中的每个用户都将受到危害。
